mapper.insert: insert into DB_STO_STOMST (WHID, LOCT, ROW, BAY, LEV, RACK_STS, STOCK_STS, PLT_ID, REMARKS, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM, BKCK_FG) values (#{whid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{row,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rackSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pltId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bkckFg,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update DB_STO_STOMST set ROW = #{row,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAY = #{bay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEV = #{lev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RACK_STS = #{rackSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOCK_STS = #{stockSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLT_ID = #{pltId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_USER_ID = #{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_DTM = #{regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MOD_USER_ID = #{modUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOD_DTM = #{modDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BKCK_FG = #{bkckFg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where WHID = #{whid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and LOCT = #{loct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select WHID, LOCT, ROW, BAY, LEV, RACK_STS, STOCK_STS, PLT_ID, REMARKS, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM, BKCK_FG from DB_STO_STOMST
